Html.name: Html0
Html.content: An, at the first glance, very simple approach is to place all the resources that are needed to build up your website in one single module. This is sufficient as long as you do not want to reuse parts of your resources and you can assure that things will not change frequently. Typically, at least for bigger projects, it's not the best choice. Why? In software developement the only constant is change.
